Primary Contact: Amara J. Waldram, Supervised Access Visit Coordinator
Primary Executive: Edna Terbasket, Executive Director; Email: executivedirector@kfs.bc.ca
Service Details: - Provides Supervised Access visits for families involved with the Ministry of Children and Family Development (MCFD) to ensure the safety of children, and to encourage the maintenance of family relationships- When appropriate allows families to visit their children in an environment where they feel most comfortable- When this is not an option, two comfortable visiting rooms are available at the Friendship Centre for families to use
